Determine if valid dp repository

Source: R/dx.R
is_valid_dp_repository.Rd

Looks at the path, runs dp_repository_check and returns TRUE if all TRUE

Usage

is_valid_dp_repository(
  path,
  checks = c("all", "git", "dp", "renv", "branch"),
  verbose = F
)

Arguments

path

Path to be evaluated

checks

any combination of c("all","git","dp","renv","branch"). default is all.

verbose

If TRUE, it will print which tests passed/failed

Value

TRUE or FALSE

Details

All diagnostic tests to check validity of dp repository are run regardless of choice of checks. Checks determines what subset is considered in return T/F.

On this page
